posts.post_content:
Type collector looking to add a good looking Ramly to my collection. Must be graded and be willing to accept cashiers check.

Email [url]royce.horak@gmail.com[/url] with scans n price.

Thanks!
Have this great looking PSA 2.5 Fred Burchell. Looks like a 6 but has a small spot of scuffing/paper loss on the back. Asking $125
